sections.In the books:
In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, the Faith is ruled over by a council known as the Most Devout. The head of the Faith is known as the [[High Septon (title)|High Septon]], who resides within the [[Great Sept of Baelor]] in the city of [[King's Landing]]. WhileÂ septons and septas serve on the council of the Most Devout, the High Septon is usually male.
